price: ߝߏ߫ ߟߎ߯ߕߌ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ߞߏ ߸ ߊ߲ ߞߏ߬ߣߌ߲ ߘߴߏ߬ ߓߍ߯ ߟߊߞߛߌ߫ ߞߐߘߍ߫
arabic: إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ إِنَّا لَمُنَجُّوهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: illā āla lūṭin innā lamunajjūhum ajmaʿīna
